questionTitle: ___ were stones piled at intervals
According to anthropologists, the earliest ancestors of humans that stood upright resembled chimpanzees ___, with sloping foreheads and protruding brows.
Scientists think ___helps some tree to conserve water in the winter.
Using many symbols makes ___ to put a large amount of information on a single map.
From her early teens ___.
anwers: Blanche Willis Howard's determination to be an author
Was determined to be an author, Blanche Willis Howard
Blanche Willis Howard was determined to be an author
An author, Blanche Willis Howard was determined to be

questionTitle: The capacity for flight __________insects from the other invertebrates.
Some forms of mollusks are extremely useful as food, especially the bivalves ________ oysters, clams, and scallops.
Rarely ________ to the movie because he prefers to watch films on his VCR.
To relieve pain caused by severe burns, prevent infection, and treat for shock, ________.
A dolphin ________ a porpoise in that it has a longer nose.
The most exact way known to science ________ the age of artifacts is based on the radioactivity of certain minerals.
So far there is no vaccine ________ in sight for the common cold.
Less moderate members of Congress are insisting that changes in the social security system ________ made.
Even if the unemployment rate ________ sharply, the drop may still be temporary.
Although the scientific community had hoped that the field of transplantation ________ , the shortage of organ donors has curtailed research.
The spectators were sitting quietly in the stand ________ had just been completed.
Eli Whitney's milling machine remained unchanged for a century and a half because ________ was so efficient.
________ a teacher in New England, Webster wrote the 'Dictionary of the American Language'.
A student should tell a dorm counselor if ________ live with his roommate again next year.
There is evidence to suggest that, at certain times of the year, smog in the Arctic is thicker ________ anywhere else on earth.
